availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph R. Snider (Shelby County, Kentucky, lieutenant colonel (U.S.A.))

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, lieutenant colonel (U.S.A.). Kentucky native. Son of Jacob Snider. Farmer in Shelby County in 1850. Farmer in Shelby County in 1860. Served in the 15th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry as captain and lieutenant colonel from October 9, 1862, to April 5, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 894-895.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby, District 2, p. 360A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby, District 2, p. 122.
Civil War Pension Index:General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288 (accessed via ancestry.com May 31, 2019).
